array.name: arr_safe_prac_passive_val
array.item: BE PHYSICALLY FIT. CAN YOU RUN WHEN IN DANGER?
Go into Active mode to plan your day & movements; locate primary safe public spots
Avoid GIVing YOUR PHONE TO A CHILD WHO MAY accidentally ACTIVATE AN ‘ALERT’ MODE

array.name: arr_safe_prac_walking_val
array.item: Stay Alert at all times. Look back from time to time.
Avoid walking alone - safety IS in numbers.
Walk on footpaths, away from the roadside.
PLAN your route Before your walk.
Be aware of your surroundings at all times and BE attuned to any suspicious behavior.
Walk with your head upright.Make eye contact.
Don’t day dream, "zone-out", or text while walking.
Act Confident with a strong body language.
Say "LEave me Alone" loudly if hassled.

array.name: arr_safe_prac_cab_val
array.item: Make sure Passenger door is not child-locked.

array.name: arr_safe_prac_elevator_val
array.item: If alone with another person and your instinct warns you, press all the numbers of the elevator so the elevator will stop at every floor.

array.name: arr_safe_prac_social_media_val
array.item: Unauthorised dissemination of sexual images & texts
Posting or sharing sexually harrassing or violent images or text

array.name: arr_safe_prac_active_val
array.item: Safety first depends on you - be empowered.
If followed, cross the street. If still stalked, enter closest public space.
Use the call back facility and appear engaged in conversation, while keeping alert and aware of your surroundings.
FLEE if you can; Engage as a last resort.
In a confrontation, verbal negotiation buys time to plan exit.

array.name: arr_safe_prac_sos_alert_val
array.item: Remember to breathe;do not panic; plan escape
Safety first depends on you - be empowered
Verbal assault buys time TO PLAN ESCAPE.
REACT QUICKLY & CATCH THE AGRRESSOR OFF-GUARD
FOCUS ON VITAL POINTS: EYES, EARS, TEMPLES, WINDPIPE, KNEES, BASE OF SPINE, GROIN.
